name: casino-jackpot-game
description: A full-stack slot machine game application using TypeScript and Bun

scripts.start: bun run start:server & bun run start:client
scripts.build: bun run build:server & bun run build:client
scripts.install: cd server && bun install && cd ../client && bun install
scripts.test: bun run test:server & bun run test:client
